name: Chicken Invaders 5
description: Chicken Invaders puts you at the forefront of a battle against invading intergalactic chickens, bent on revenge for our oppression of Earth chickens. This time, the chickens have hatched a devious plan to block out sunlight and freeze Earth to death!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 220 MB available space

reviews.review_text: 10/10 game  this game bring back my childhood memories of Chicken Invaders  if you love to play challaging games and eat some chicken this game is for you!!! one of the best game to buy worth every penny. thank you InterAction studios for making just a beautiful , fun game. looking forward to buy next series too!!

10/10 would cluck again  -Edit after a few hours of play-  The power ups are pretty amazing, you can level them up with these little chicken livers. The types of weapons you get are gifted to you by the chickens you slaughter. You get little weapons or satalites that follow you around and you can fry them with a giant plume of fire. After you eat enough chicken you built up bombs of explosive gas. Just press enter to shoot your fart bomb you've been saving up for.  This really is a cluckin good game! I highly recommend it to everyone that has a fear of chickens!
What an awesome and fun game, Cannot stop playing it:)
Game is polished. Very fair, you know when you die its your fault. very fun with some cool unlockables.
great game played it through a few times mindless fun

This is...a ridiculous game. The shooting is okay. It's not great by any means, but it's funny and will keep you entertained if your bored. You can unlock cosmetic stuff for your ship, which can keep your interest as well. If you live in the Midwest, you'll enjoy the humor more. Particularly if you're from Wayne Nebraska and have been forced to experience the Wayne Checken Show you will understand the humor. It's almost like the town collectively funded this game for the show. Oh, and if you have no idea what the The Wayne Checken Show is Google, 'Wayne Chickendales.'
A 2D chicken shooter in which you have to save the world from the giant feathers. Intriguing yet?
Ah, memories. Used to play the first one when I was a kid. Still rocks :)

Bought this at 50% for Â£1.99, though I'd say the full price is well worth it for what you get.  I've played all the original Chicken Invaders, and love how each new game to the series adds something new and interesting. With this game being new weapons, maps, waves and unlockables.  Took about 2 hours to complete the game on the easiest difficulty, after one failed attempt, enjoyed it with no real sense of tedium. There are many, MANY unlockables and customization to keep you busy, I can see lots more runs before getting bored then coming back to it every now and then.  Overall, it's a great game at a great price.

Can't be beat for the price. As a chicken, I find this highly offensive. This is an insult to all chickenkind.   But it's also a lot of fun. Blast space chickens, get power ups, play with a friend. Lots of different weapons. Good sound, good graphics, simple controls. Everyone can learn to play in minutes but still be challenged by the increasing difficulty of the game.
I've played every chicken invaders game to come out over the years, and this one is thus far my favourite.

So tihs game was gifted to me by my friend because we were bored and i think we've had a good giggle at it aswell as hateful insults because we steal upgrades and weapons. 8/8 would shoot chicken with high powered laser beams again.
I decided to give this game a nomination on the Autumn Sale  When I saw this award 'Best Use Of A Farm Animal', this game was my number 1 choice.
